clubs.name: Snowboarding
clubs.description: My snowboarding skills are like my life decisions: sometimes I land perfectly, other times I end up face-first in the snow.

clubs.name: Dance
clubs.description: Where the only thing louder than the music is the sound of me trying not to trip over my own feet.

clubs.name: Music
clubs.description: who needs reality when you've got a pair of headphones and a playlist that understands you better than any human ever could?

clubs.name: E-sports
clubs.description: My gaming skills are like a fine wine: they improve with age... and lots of practice.

clubs.name: Photography
clubs.description: Where your dinner gets cold because you're too busy taking 37 slightly different photos of it.

clubs.name: Painting
clubs.description: Where 'I'm just going to add a tiny detail' translates to 'I'll see you in another 5 hours.

clubs.name: Swimming
clubs.description: It's like running, but if you stop, you die. Talk about motivation!

clubs.name: Kite Surfing
clubs.description: Ever wanted to combine the fear of drowning with the fear of heights? Kite surfing's got you covered.

clubs.name: Pottery
clubs.description: Ah, pottery, the hobby where you spend hours making something you could've bought for three dollars at IKEA.

clubs.name: Story Writing
clubs.description: where 'based on a true story' means I overheard a conversation at a coffee shop and filled in the gaps with aliens and a time-travel subplot.
